text: Nin is a surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alberto Nin Frías (1878-1937), Uruguayan writer *Anaïs Nin (1903–1977), French-born author and diarist *Andrés Nin (1892-1937), Spanish revolutionary *Joaquin Nin (1859-1949), Cuban pianist and composer *Joaquin Nin-Culmell (1908–2004), Cuban-Spanish composer *Khadja Nin (born 1959), Burundian singer *Rodolfo Nin Novoa (born 1948), Uruguayan politician, former Vice President ==See also== *Nia (given name) *Nina (name) *Niño (name) *Nino (name)
title: Nin (surname)
